description:
Tough, old-school and spacious. The Algonquin Canoe Pack is made of bomber 840-denier nylon with a comfortable, but simple padded harness. Lots of external lash points for attaching even more stuff.

  • Made of burly 840-denier nylon
  • Ballistic nylon webbing is double bar-tacked for burliness
  • Curved shoulder and waist harness are padded and mesh covered
  • Mesh and foam padded backpanel for comfort with heavy loads
  • Top opening with a spindrift collar and a flap that closes with 3 buckles
  • Side compression straps compress the load or act as lash points for extra gear
  • Daisy chains on front for lashing gear
name: Level Six Algonquin 55 Canoe Pack
